CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ac_users` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `email` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  `login` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  `password` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  `role` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  `first_name` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  `last_name` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  `nickname` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `email` (`email`),
  UNIQUE KEY `login` (`login`),
  KEY `password` (`password`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ak_keys` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `steam_key` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `ebay_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `game_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `seller` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `price` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL,
  `status` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `gig_order_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `gig_order_item_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(),
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `ebay_id` (`ebay_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ak_sellers` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `password` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `info` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `aq_settings` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `value` text NOT NULL,
  `category` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `awaiting_orders` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `UserID` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `ItemID` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `Title` varchar(150) NOT NULL,
  `CommentType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `TransactionID` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `OrderLineItemID` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `EndTime` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
  `7days_sent` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
  `14days_sent` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
  `last_seen` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `bonus_sent` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `blacklist` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `item_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `category` varchar(500) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT 'item',

) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COLLATE=latin1_german1_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cdvet` (

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cdvet_feed_full` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

  `title` varchar(250) NOT NULL,
  `UnitQuantity` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL,

  `desc` text NOT NULL,
  `short_desc` text NOT NULL,

) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cdvet_feed_log` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ebay_msgs_outbox` (

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ebay_orders` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `order_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

  `items_amo` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `total_price` decimal(6,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00,
  `ShippingAddress` text NOT NULL,
  `BuyerUserID` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `BuyerEmail` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `BuyerFirstName` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `BuyerLastName` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `BuyerFeedbackScore` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `show` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'no',
  `comment` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `is_notified` enum('yes','no') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'no',
  `BayerRegistrationDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `CreatedTime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
  `LastModTime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
  `PaidTime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
  `ShippedTime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00',
  `addTime` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  `block_ip` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
